derivativeBalance().details: Balance of derivative tokens received from Strategy, if applicable

initializeBankerJoeStrategy(address,addr.details: The function should be called at time of deployment

params.bank_: the bank associated with the strategy
params.derivative_: the JToken address received from BankerJoe
params.reward_: the address of the reward token JOE
params.underlying_: the underlying token that is deposited

investedBalance().details: Get the exchange rate (which is scaled up by 1e18) and multiply by amount of JTokens

returns._0: The amount of underlying the strategy has invested

rewardBalance().details: Balance of reward tokens awaiting liquidation, if applicable

setRegistry(address).details: Requires sender to be Governance of the new Registry to avoid bricking.Ideally should not be used

params.amount: The amount of tokens to sweep
params.recipient: The address to send the sweeped tokens to
params.token: The address of the token to sweep

underlyingBalance().details: Balance of underlying awaiting Strategy investment

bank().notice: The Bank that the Strategy is associated with

derivative().notice: The derivative token received from AaveV2 (aToken)

investedBalance().notice: Get the balance of underlying invested by the Strategy

reward().notice: The reward token received from AaveV2 (stkAave)

setRegistry(address).notice: Set the Registry for the contract. Only callable by Governance.

sweep(address,uint256,address).notice: Governance function to sweep any stuck / airdrop tokens to a given recipient

underlying().notice: The underlying token the Strategy invests in AaveV2

userdoc.notice: Standard, unleveraged strategy. Invest underlying tokens into derivative JTokens
